data.describe: 通过引入简单的模型类来解决上面提到的问题
data.detail: 通过这种方法，调用代码 可以拥有类型安全，name 和 email 字段的自动完成以及编译时异常（检测）。如果你发生了笔误或者把 String 类型的字段看成了 int 类型，App 将不会编译，而不是在运行时崩溃

data.describe: We think Flutter will help you create beautiful, fast apps, with a productive, extensible and open development model.
data.detail: Flutter is Google's mobile app SDK for crafting high-quality native interfaces on iOS and Android in record time. Flutter works with existing code, is used by developers and organizations around the world, and is free and open source
